thread.title: Jacinta

author: Jacinta
title: Jacinta
text:
I recently completed the classic Tour of India beginning and ending in Delhi. Sadly I hadnt done my homework on India but have done a lot of reading since. Intrepid ensure they stick to their values and guiding principals so I have no complaints there. The challenge comes from the clash of my individualist Western eyes judging the Indian collective society in this transitional phase of their history to a global economy! Yes, it is complicated! I kept thinking "Why is your health system so bad? Why is your infrastructure crumbling? You provide my country with its doctors and engineers for God's sake!"
Now, from a distance I appreciate that they value family above everything and that is not such a bad thing.
I will return and experience India with less judgemental eyes.
